amendment.description: To increase by $25,000,000 the amount appropriated for Operation and Maintenance for the Department of Defense for programs, projects, and activities in the continental United States, and to provide an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 115, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 59. Record Vote Number: 41.

action.text: Amendment SA 115 proposed by Senator Toomey to Amendment SA 26.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 115 proposed by Senator Toomey to Amendment SA 26.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 115, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 59. Record Vote Number: 41.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 115, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 59. Record Vote Number: 41.
